Contact Us

This website is a pilot project of Detroit Head Start providers. We will be updating it and improving it over time.

Have you noticed a problem or do you have a question? Get in touch:

Work with us

There are many job opportunities available at Detroit Head Start centers. Contact one of our providers to find out about current openings:
